title: High end graded 1887 Old Judges for sale
author: bstnguy5

posts.post_title: High end graded 1887 Old Judges for sale
posts.post_content:
Some of these are the highest ever graded by SGC or PSA. Prices include priority mail shipping. Paypal is accepted with no additional fees. Serious inquiries send me an email or private message. Thanks!

SGC 86 (7.5) Cannonball Crane $1900
SGC 86 (7.5) Abner Dalrymple   $1900
SGC 86 (7.5) Julie Freeman      $1900
SGC 84 (7)   Gus Krock(pitching) $1600
SGC 84 (7)   Larry Twitchell     $1600
SGC 80 (6)   A.M. Tuckerman   $900

If Twitchell is shown with Detroit (as opposed to Cleveland), please send scan to [url]detroitwolverines@gmail.com[/url] 

Thanks!
